me.lucko.helper.messaging

Interface Channel<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the channel message type
    All Superinterfaces:
    TypeAware<T>

    public interface Channel<T>
extends TypeAware<T>
    Represents an individual messaging channel.

    Channels can be subscribed to through a ChannelAgent.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getName()
      Gets the name of the channel.
      TypeToken<T> getType()
      Gets the channels message type.
      ChannelAgent<T> newAgent()
      Creates a new ChannelAgent for this channel.
      CompletableFuture<Boolean> sendMessage(T message)
      Sends a new message to the channel.

      • newAgent

        @Nonnull
ChannelAgent<T> newAgent()
        Creates a new ChannelAgent for this channel.
        Returns:

      • sendMessage

        @Nonnull
CompletableFuture<Boolean> sendMessage(@Nonnull
                                                 T message)
        Sends a new message to the channel.

        This method will return immediately, and the future will be completed once the message has been sent.

        The future will return true if the message was sent successfully.

        Parameters:
        message - the message to dispatch
        Returns:
        a future which will complete when the message has sent.
